plan.plan_title: Rally Assembly at Freedom Park Exceeds Permit

steps.details: Event control to verify actual attendance and communicate concerns if it exceeds safety thresholds.
Enforce safe decibel levels and structural safety checks for stages and sound setups.
Deploy police and marshals to manage ingress and prevent unauthorized route changes.
Plan alternate dispersal routes and inform public transport operators.
Watch for escalation signals and misinformation to intervene early.
Police to manage timed closures along Seshadri Rd and Palace Rd to facilitate rally movements.
BMTC to use alternate corridors and increase capacity on diversion routes.
Notify CBD businesses about closures and suggest staff arrival adjustments.
Set up public information booths for commuters to get route and timing updates.
TMC to track secondary congested routes and deploy mitigations as needed.
Implement entry controls and staggered boarding to reduce platform density and risk.
BMRCL to increase train frequency if power and headways permit to clear platforms.
Station medics and evacuation teams to handle fainting or crush incidents.
Provide frequent update loops to manage passenger expectations and guide dispersal.
Coordinate post-event transport capacity to avoid prolonged overcrowding at interchange nodes.
